description:
Basic support for ppapi trusted broker process: --type=ppapi-broker.


BUG=none
TEST=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=80792

messages.text: Small CL to add the process type. Let me know if there's someone else you'd like to review the Chrome implementation of the broker code.

LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/6803016/diff/1/content/ppapi_plugin/ppapi_broker_main.cc
File content/ppapi_plugin/ppapi_broker_main.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/6803016/diff/1/content/ppapi_plugin/ppapi_broker_main.cc#newcode24
content/ppapi_plugin/ppapi_broker_main.cc:24: //TODOi(ddorwin): Do we need a different type of thread?
Let's try to use PpapiThread. If we find some problem, we can replace it.

subject: Basic support for ppapi trusted broker process: --type=ppapi-broker.
